document.full_text: north sudanese army forces took control of the main town in the disputed abyei region on saturday after fighting with southern forces, both sides said, in further violence ahead of southern secession.
document.title: north sudan takes control of key town in abyei
lines_and_colors: north sudanese army forces took control of the main town in the disputed abyei region on saturday after fighting with southern forces, both sides said, in further violence ahead of southern secession.
